alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Sullivan and central Pike Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shohola to near Werry Lake. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bushkill, Matamoras, Milford, Dingmans Ferry, Millrift, Glen Spey, Twin Lakes and Tamiment. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 84 between 46 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania.
